WITHDRAWALDESCRIPTION: Financially, it was more economical to outsource our transfer agent functions.

ENTITYNAME: Seligman New Technologies Fund II, Inc.
WITHDRAWALDESCRIPTION: The registrant, which was an investment company registered under the Investment Company Act of 1940, was liquidated and dissolved.
The registrant, which was an investment company registered under the Investment Company Act of 1940, was liquidated and dissolved.

The assets of Accessor Capital Management LP were acquired by Forward Management LLC in September 2008 and the Accessor Funds, for which Accessor Capital Management acted as transfer agent, were merged into the Forward Funds by a Plan of Reorganization.
